nodes.text: Greve was a male lieutenant in the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Guard who served during the Galactic War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic. During the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic, Greve was among the contingent of Imperial forces sent to the planet Belsavis in order to combat the Dread Host, the enthralled forces of the rogue Dread Masters.

Lieutenant Greve appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Mission Support Vendor for the Imperial faction in the Section X Daily Area, which was added in Game Update 1.5: HK-51 Activated on November 15, 2012. According to the game's files, he is Human.
